lead_paragraph: Technology entrepreneur, merger manager and turnaround expert, Olaf Koch believes he has enough experience of big challenges to steer Europe's fourth-biggest retailer Metro through its next one: e-commerce.

headline.main: Metro CEO Ready to Steer Retailer Through e-Commerce Challenge
headline.print_headline: Metro CEO Ready to Steer Retailer Through e-Commerce Challenge
